About.Title: About Me
About.Desc: Hi Everyone, I am Jigar Ahir from Gujarat, India.I learned HTML, CSS, JavaScript etc, Worked with libraries & frameworks like ReactJS, NextJS, NodeJS, ExpressjJS, NestJS. Have a keen knowledge of databases like MySQL, MongoDB and Firebase. Apart from Coding I love to play games.

DegreePursuing.Title: Degree Pursuing
DegreePursuing.Collage: BHAKTA KAVI NARSINH MEHTA UNIVERSITY, Junagadh
details: I joined my college in 2017. Cleared First Year with a good academic performance.
I have studied basic software engineering subjects like DS, Algorithms, DBMS, OS, COA, AI etc.
Apart from this, I have done courses on web designing, Data Science, Cloud Computing and Full Stack Development.

RecentWorks.Desc: My works makes use of vast variety of latest technology tools. My best experience is to create React projects and deploy them to web applications using Github Pages.

DUMMY_PROJECTS.description: This project is a React app to generate a creative professional website based on Data provided. The website uses no backend and is free to fork and use.
A React project to get a track of weekly expenses. It also creates a graphical data to help monitor the expenses on daily basis
It is a Realtime Chat Website built using Socket.io and Express with NodeJs as a backend and MongoDB as a database. It updates the chat messages in realtime with Typing notification of other users
It is a React based website demonstrating how food order works with Cart updates and storing it in Firebase Database.
It is a solution to challenge of FrontEnd Mentors. It is a React website to depict facts about our Solar System.
A website where you can generate strong Passwords to use as Authentication in different websites and apps based on the difficulty level set by you.
A simple website to generate QR Code of any text provided as Input.It fetches an API to provide you the required QR Code.
A Calculator to do basic operations. It is a React app with three different themes.

Touch.Title: Get In Touch
Touch.Desc: I would love to hear from you, so whether you need a quote, have a question or just want to say hello, please feel free to drop me a line.
